pass-along-ailment.name: Pass Along Ailment

special: Transfer one disease or poison condition from caster to target
Target makes GRT check (Difficulty 35) or contracts the condition at full strength

pass-along-ailment.description: Touch a creature and transfer a disease or poison affecting you to them. Your suffering becomes their burden, leaving you cleansed while they inherit your affliction.

manifest-minor-disease.name: Manifest Minor Disease
manifest-minor-disease.description: Conjure a mild sickness from nothing, calling forth the echoes of plagues past. The disease is not deadly, but it weakens and distracts. Target gains 'Minor Sickness' condition: -1 D20 on all physical rolls, -5 ft. movement.

sickened-dagger.name: Sickened Dagger

special: On hit, target must make GRT check (Difficulty 25) or gain Poisoned condition

sickened-dagger.description: Infuse a weapon with festering disease. Each cut carries contagion into the wound, ensuring even glancing blows leave lasting damage.

disease-body.name: Disease Body
disease-body.description: Your touch becomes a vector for spreading corruption. Flesh you contact begins to fail, immune systems collapse, and strength drains away. Target gains 'Weakened' condition: -2 to all Physical stat modifiers for 3 rounds.

manifest-minor-contagion.name: Manifest Minor Contagion

special: All creatures entering or starting turn in cloud make GRT check (Difficulty 30) or gain 'Minor Sickness' condition

manifest-minor-contagion.description: Release a cloud of infectious mist that spreads sickness to all who breathe it. The contagion seeks warm bodies with hungry persistence.

disease-mind.name: Disease Mind
disease-mind.description: Infect a target's thoughts with cognitive decay. Their memories blur, decisions become difficult, and the line between reality and fever-dream grows thin.

manifest-lesser-disease.name: Manifest Lesser Disease

special: 2D8 damage at start of each turn
Contagious: creatures within 5 ft. make GRT check Difficulty 35 or contract

manifest-lesser-disease.description: Summon a genuine plague, drawing forth diseases that have claimed countless lives throughout history. The sickness burns through the body with terrible efficiency.

manifest-greater-disease.name: Manifest Greater Disease

special: Highly contagious: 15 ft. radius, GRT check Difficulty 45

manifest-greater-disease.description: Call forth one of the legendary plagues, a sickness so terrible it has toppled civilizations. The disease spreads rapidly and resists all but the most powerful treatments.

eroding-touch.name: Eroding Touch

special: Reduce target object's HP by an additional 1D10

eroding-touch.description: Your hands carry the inevitability of time's passage. What you touch begins to break down, materials weakening as centuries pass in heartbeats.

unravel-magic.name: Unravel Magic

special: Reduce duration of one magical effect on target by 2 rounds
If effect has less than 2 rounds remaining, it ends immediately

unravel-magic.description: Tug at the threads of magical effects, accelerating their natural decay. Even the strongest enchantments bow to entropy eventually.

dust-to-dust.name: Dust to Dust

special: Non-magical, non-living materials in zone take damage per round

dust-to-dust.description: Accelerate the natural breakdown of non-living matter. Stone crumbles, metal rusts, wood rots, all returning to the dust from which they came.
